MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan and Ballantrae. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a fault between Meadowpark Ballantrae and Currarie Cottage and we now expect your supply to be restored by 2am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:51pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
